column1: The Pit Room////Sitting in the outdoor seating area with my family
column2: listening to Amarillo By Morning and eating the BEST barbecue made this Iowa Gal's trip!!!  The atmosphere is great
column3: the long line that stretched through the restaurant and out the door went quick.  These people know how to smoke meat!  The Waygu smoked beef rib was a treat!  So glad we found this place!
